page.title: 01HARDWICK AND MADINGLEY AREA
page.content: The genral area of the block is covered with farmland with two villages within.These are Hardwick and Madingley.Cutting through the block is a main trunk road the A45.The farms are all crop farms.There are 13 farms Chivers is a fruit and cereal farm.Hardwick has two new housing estates.The Gallifords and the Limes estate.The school has 236 chidren at the moment.Old Hardwick has a church and a pub.The pub is called the Blue Lion.Hardwick has two shops.Some of the Madingley area is farmland where they grow corn wheat.There are lots of wildflowers in Madingley.There is a pub called The Three Horseshoes.It is like an old cottage with a thatched roof.Madingley Hall is like a castle,and has a lovely lawn.
